text: Pedro José de Arteta y Calisto (1797 - 24 August 1873http://proekt- wms.narod.ru/states/ecuador.htm) was Vice President of Ecuador from 1865 to 1869 and served briefly as President from 6 November 1867 to 20 January 1868. He was the brother of Nicolás Joaquín de Arteta y Calisto, first Archbishop of Quito. He was a Conservative. Arteta was born in 1787 in Quito, Ecuador. He died from a heart attack in his home in Quito, Ecuador, aged 66. ==References== Category:1797 births Category:1873 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Pedro José de Arteta
